listing.listing_description:
La Bella Casa is a charming Caribbean estate surrounded by lush tropical gardens and sprawling green lawns. The views overlooking elegant La Samanna Hotel, Baie Longue Beach and the deep blue Caribbean dazzle morning to night. Sunsets are magical paintings in hot pinks and orange; a colorful backdrop for cocktail hour. Featuring 12 bedrooms, the villa is a perfect setting for large families, groups of friends or weddings. Although spacious, it has an intimate feel. You can be together or quite private.

The interior and exterior décor is an exotic mix of Indonesian and French style. Neutral shades of white and cream are accented with pops of color in every room. Soft grey tiles run throughout. The exterior terraces and covered verandahs on the upper and lower level provide multiple spaces for relaxing and dining. The new terrace furniture is modern blending beautifully with the sea and large blue pool set in the center of the upper terrace. For fun, a ping pong table sits under a verandah. Throughout the villa, arches and iron work add design interest.

The interior great room is very spacious and casually elegant, perfect for gathering. Sliding glass pocket doors open the room to the view and breezes. New contemporary furniture in the living room include the colours of the sea & sky and complement the rest of the interiors. The soaring ceilings are popped with blue trim, a design theme repeated throughout the villa. The pretty French Country kitchen in blue and white Provence tiles features a stunning French stove and beautiful views. A barbeque sits just off the kitchen.

Seven bedrooms are in the main house. Each has private outdoor seating with either garden or ocean views. The overall mood in each room mixes Provence colours and fabrics in white with blue, yellow or red. Most rooms feature romantic four poster beds. Each en-suite bathroom is tiled in the iconic Provence tiles found in many Terres Basses villas. Several have ocean or garden views from the walk-in showers. A very large suite on the lower level is a quiet oasis with its own large terrace and seating both inside and outside. The villa also has a fitness room.

There are also 3 detached suites, offering a bit of extra privacy for members of your group. One cottage has two king size beds with ensuite bathroom, while the other has a king, 2 twin beds and a private bathroom. Lastly, a studio apartment below the main house has a queen size bed, private living quarters and a kitchenette, making it the ideal space for any staff members that might traveling with you.

You are well located, 8 minutes to the French capital of Marigot, with its shops, restaurants, markets and galleries. In the opposite direction, you are only 10 minutes to the international airport of Princess Juliana (SXM). Grand Case and Philipsburg are also only 30-minutes away.

listing.listing_description:
Luxuriously equipped Caribbean Soul Villa is set in a fabulous beachfront oasis affording unobstructed views of Ambergris Caye, Belize’s largest island, northeast in the Caribbean Sea.

On the first floor, an opulent marble-decked verandah welcomes you to the entrance of Caribbean Soul. Inside you’ll discover brightly colored paintings, amazingly detailed wooden carved sculptures and beautifully woven tapestries adorning the entire villa, celebrating the vast talents of local artists. Tiled marble floors and vaulted ceilings accentuate how open and spacious this villa is. Step inside the oversized living room and take in that uncompromising view through the 20ft. long wall of windows and glass doors, opening directly onto the verandah. Furnished handsomely with comfortable seating for at least 12 people, the enormous living room boasts a 50" plasma high definition television and an iHome iPod stereo docking station with subwoofer, as well as Wi-Fi and cable television. A fully equipped gourmet kitchen with granite countertops and a breakfast bar with seating for four, offers every kitchen convenience imaginable, with state of the art appliances and cookware. The dining room can host eight people and you can dine overlooking the spectacular views.

Your private, fully furnished poolside verandah is a gorgeous outdoor space overlooking the reef. It’s the perfect place to watch the sun as it sets over the lagoon or rises over the ocean.

Your three luxuriously furnished, restful bedrooms all feature en-suite bathrooms. The master suite looks out across the ocean, and offers dazzling sunrise views from its king size bed. The luxurious marble bathroom features a whirlpool bathtub, a marble standing shower, and dual marble sinks and is joined to the bedroom by a walk-through closet. The bedroom is also furnished with a 32" high definition flat panel television. The "French Door" bedroom - given the name because of its glass-paned double French doors - enjoys views of the ocean and pool. There’s also a queen size bed, oversized closets and a private, marble bathroom with standing shower. The "Sunset" bedroom, also complete with private marble bathroom, standing shower and ample closet space, has its own external private entrance. This bedroom is furnished with a king bed and affords fabulous sunset views in the evening.

Come to Belize and experience your Caribbean Soul! San Pedro Town, the only town on the island, is just 3 miles away. Belize’s famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25 mile length of the island.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to Villa Paraiso Montezuma, a spectacular compound of over 20,000 square feet composed of multiple structures set over thirteen lush tropical acres in the stunning Nicoya Peninsula of Costa Rica. Renowned architect, Ronald Zurcher – perhaps best known for his design of Costa Rica’s only Four Seasons Hotel – has designed this holiday home to provide the ultimate private resort experience. From use of the resident horses to a private suspension bridge that cuts directly into town, this monumental vacation rental offers a unique perspective on getting away from it all!

The infinity pool with a swim-up bar takes it to the next level. With a barbecue and television located inside the wet bar/outdoor kitchen, beer and burgers can be enjoyed while still soaking the pool. You’ll also find a wood burning oven that’s perfect for pizza time. Enjoy a workout, yoga or massage in the gym strategically placed atop a dramatic 100 yard cliff for unobstructed 180 degree Pacific Ocean views. Inside, you will also find a home entertainment unit, sound system and Wi-Fi. The impressive home theater room will make it a movie night to remember.

The high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors keep the feelings airy and bright at this private home. The spacious interiors feature stately and comfortable furnishings in the living and formal dining areas. The expansive kitchen features gas hobs, a center island and a breakfast nook.

Five exquisite bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, three with dazzling ocean views accommodating up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite also features a jetted tub. Just a ten minute walk from the beach, Villa Paraiso makes a great bet for a family vacation, a golf getaway or a special event like a wedding.

A 100 yard private suspension bridge was engineered to provide guests with a shortcut from the villa to the bohemian streets of Montezuma, which is known for its striking natural surroundings and wildlife where howler and white-faced Capuchin monkeys as well as colorful iguanas never seem more than a glance away. Come enjoy this taste of paradise with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This lush, tropical villa, located in St. Croix, the largest of the US Virgin Islands, features sweeping views of the ocean and mountains. The property spans over 3.5 acres with a main house, cottage and 2 apartments. Recently renovated, the estate incorporates modern essentials alongside centuries old architecture and history. Take a refreshing plunge into the crystal sea at Cane Bay Beach.

Originally built as a sugar mill in 1791, Estate Belvedere retains its old world charm; the front door is the mill’s original entrance. Guests can sunbathe on comfortable loungers next to the 20x50 foot stone swimming pool, complete with a large deck and views of other islands. Amenities include an entertainment center, Wi-Fi, 2 laundry rooms, a full-time caretaker, and a fully equipped exercise room. The interior showcases elements of design that embody sophistication and are complemented by a selection of elegant furnishings. A gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances makes cooking a pleasure with the added bonus of an herb garden. Why not whip up dinner on the patio barbecue? 

All 6 bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and climate control. Three of them are located in the main building while the 3 remaining bedrooms are found in the tower, each with the added feature of direct outdoor access. Nearby snorkeling and scuba diving are incredibly satisfying. A neighboring Country Club is perfect for golf and tennis enthusiasts, as well as the island’s world-famous bioluminescent bays, which are a feast for the eyes. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perched up high on the seaside hills of Corossol, this St. Barts luxury villa is perfect for a romantic getaway, or honeymoon. With panoramic ocean views, Passage's balcony is an incredible vantage point for Caribbean sunsets. Just five minutes from shopping, restaurants, and nightlife in Gustavia, you'll have a prime location for exploring this iconic vacation destination. And, there are seven beautiful beachfront areas within two-to-ten kilometers of Passage.

When your property is given a gift, like Passage's incredible ocean view, you design accordingly. Every room in this hillside villa faces, and opens to the ocean. Floor-to-ceiling glass doors dominate the exterior wall. When open, the entire living room and master bedroom have free-flowing access to the pool and balcony. Fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight easily fill the modern-minimalistic interior. Decorated with designer furniture, high-end electronics, and splashes of turquoise, Passage has a calming, yet elegant atmosphere. The kitchen features a wall of stylish cabinetry and fully integrated appliances. Between the lounge and the kitchen, the gorgeous modern wood dining table, with seating for eight, divides the space. And, on the other side of the villa, the master bedroom awaits, with a king-sized bed, en-suite, walk-in closet, and ocean view.

Some of the other interior features include Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a dishwasher, and several television options. On the balcony, there's alfresco dining, lounge chairs, living areas, and a barbecue, all surrounding the refreshing infinity pool.

Undoubtedly, Passage's ocean view will inspire you to get out and see it first hand. Luckily, you're in St. Barts, one of the world's finest beach vacation destinations. Within nine kilometers you'll be able to find eight amazing beachfront areas, the closest being St Jean Beach. Nikki, Gouverneur, and Flamands Beach are the most popular on the Island. Colombier is a great alternative, as it is accessible only by boat, or a twenty-minute hike beginning at the Port of Gustavia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Walk-in Closet, Television, Air conditioning, Ocean view
Fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar
Formal dining area with seating for 8

listing.listing_description:
Koi swish their tails in the rooftop pond at this sun-dappled, white-walled, utterly cool retreat in Mexico’s Riviera Nayarit. Of course, there’s also a swimming pool for your friends and family, and open-sided rooms that blur the line between indoors and out. A location in the Nuevo Vallarta resort community means you’ve got water views over a quiet canal—and a 4-minute drive to Playa Varadero.

Watch boats come and go at the marina across the way from outdoor sitting and dining areas by the koi pond, set off on your own excursion from the private dock, and stretch out in the shade of palm fronds and umbrellas in a lounger by the swimming pool and hot tub. A housekeeper and driver will be available throughout your holiday, and there’s chef service for breakfast and lunch.

Fold back the villa’s glass walls to let balmy breezes waft over an open-concept great room with stone floors and stone-colored furniture in mid-century-inspired silhouettes. The sitting area, dining table for 12, and fully equipped kitchen all share the space. One of the 5 bedrooms also has its own kitchenette, making it ideal for couples or in-laws looking to set their own schedule.

Follow the Puerto Vallarta canals out toward the Bay of Banderas and the Pacific Ocean, where you can try out surfing or take a sunset stroll along the sand. There are 2 beaches within a 10-minute drive, and the mountain views at El Tigre Golf Club are 2 minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The Bird of Paradise Villa is a true gem for the connoisseur. Named one of the “Top 20 Villas in the World” by Islands Magazine, this Anguillan oasis offers the exclusivity of a boutique hotel, the privacy of an enclave and the top tier services and amenities of a first class resort. Perched above a perfect crescent beach, Bird of Paradise looks across the Caribbean to the mountains of St. Barths and St. Martin.

Bird of Paradise boasts not one, but three swimming pool areas, the most extensive bathing system of any villa on Anguilla. The lagoon-style pools are heated and range in depth from three to nine feet. The property manager works exclusively for the villa and will meet and greet you upon arrival at the airport or dock. Your reservation includes a twenty-four hour concierge, daily housekeeping and a grounds person to assist with beach chairs and other requests. With its executive chef, Kids’ Club and spa services, you may never want to leave the grounds of this exclusive paradise.

Bird of Paradise includes seating for more than fifty guests in the living areas. Other features across the approximately 4000 square feet property include an interior living room with a wet bar, an exterior living room with a fireplace, a covered verandah with a day bed and lounge chairs. Enjoy the privilege of your sundeck as well as a ‘hilltop’ deck with chairs and an Indonesian-style gazebo. Technology at Bird of Paradise includes flat screen televisions, DVDs, a nine-speaker sound system and Wi-Fi.

The four air conditioned bedroom suites each have private, exterior entrances and private verandahs with lounge chairs and views of the beach. Each suite is equipped with a credenza that holds a refrigerator and coffee/wine service for added comfort. You will find interior/exterior showers, whirlpool baths and walk-in closets. Luxury linens, and toileteries, beach bags and towels are complimentary.

Whether for walking, swimming and snorkeling, Sandy Hill Bay is a delightful beach for your time on this wonderful island. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. Come discover a soothing island rhythm and warm hospitality at Bird of Paradise!

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/girls-getaway-weekend-ideas/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This architectural gem in Costa Rica is located directly on Santa Teresa Beach, a fabulous destination famous for its surf waves, pristine sands, and delicious cuisine. Steps from the heart of town, Casa Teresa offers an ideal alternative to the region's hotels and resorts, featuring exquisite Spanish Colonial charm and artistry, exceptional amenities, and ample space for relaxation in total privacy. Four king bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, corporate retreats, and groups of friends up to eight in size.

Expansive outdoor living areas form the perfect haven for festive gatherings, special occasions, or inspired relaxation. Bask in the tropical sunlight or the dappled shade of lush trees, and dip into the pool for a refreshing swim. Step directly from the property onto the pristine sands of Playa Santa Teresa, and plunge into the luminous sea. Savor a siesta in the canopied bed and sip delicious fruit juice in the lounge. Relish alfresco meals on the veranda or at the large picnic table in the yard. Then admire the sublime sunset from the ocean's edge, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting nighttime lighting.

Sliding glass doors open from the veranda to the villa's interiors, breathing the ocean air into the home. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a fabulous marble wet bar, easily serving the various living and dining areas. Beautiful details like the arched front door, vaulted foyer, and blue-tiled interior fountain cast an enchanting spell of antique Spanish America.

All four bedroom suites feature comfortable king beds, TVs, air conditioning, and ensuite bathrooms. Two open to the side yard, and two open directly to the pool and beach, with lovely ocean views. The superb master suite includes a walk-in closet and deluxe ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and both indoor and outdoor showers

Santa Teresa has been hailed as the "next Tulum" by the New York Times and an "idyllic, healthy oasis" by Vogue. A short walk from the town's main drag, you're within minutes of some of the finest nightlife spots, seafood restaurants, eco-adventures, and watersport venues in the region. The wonderful town and beach of Carmen are just seven minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this property is near a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Built to capture incredible ocean views, Villa Skyline is a modern paradise. Located in Turks and Caicos, on the western edge of Grace Bay, Villa Skyline is perfect for a family getaway, couples retreat, or even a romantic, island honeymoon with a little extra space. Nearby, you’ll find duty-free shopping, Casablanca Casino, exciting nightlife, and the beautiful beachfront of Grace Bay. 

Sleek and stylish, Villa Skyline is a trendsetting estate, outfitted with state of the art electronics, designer furniture, and a minimalistic approach to decor, focusing on quality over quantity. The second-floor living room is a spacious, open concept area that flows to the kitchen, dining area and beyond to the entrance foyer. All of these spaces feature wide openings to the terrace and balcony, allowing the fresh breeze, natural sunlight, and ocean views to provide refreshing atmosphere throughout the interior. The three levels of balcony make it easy to find solitude to work on your tan or host group gatherings and social events. All three bedrooms have incredible ocean views as well.

Outside, you’ll love cooling off in Skyline’s refreshing swimming pool, lounging in the hot tub, and gazing upon the endless ocean view from a sunbed. Back inside, Skyline is equipped with air conditioning, Wi-Fi, cable television, and a sound system. There’s also a fitness room and office space if you need to keep up with any daily routines.

Grace Bay Beach, just a few minutes from home, features calm waters with a clear, sandy bottom that is perfect for families and casual swimming. If you’re interested in diving or snorkeling, the barrier reef on the outskirts of the bay are buzzing with aquatic life, but only accessible by boat. If there’s a golfer in your party, Provo Golf Club has the island’s only course and consistently ranks among the Caribbean’s top ten.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find plenty to celebrate at the beachfront Hacienda Magica. This expansive Riviera Maya vacation rental has a gorgeous location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, an attentive staff and fourteen bedrooms. Reserve this luxury property to host a family reunion or milestone celebration, or along with nearby Hacienda Corazon and Hacienda Del Mar to hold a wedding for up to 250 guests—and the honeymoon after

During your holiday, a gourmet chef, manager, butler and housekeeper will see to your needs. The villa feels like your own resort on Fatima Bay, with a pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and sound system, as well as a private tennis court. Inside, you’ll find a ping-pong table for the kids, and satellite television and Wi-Fi for the grown-ups.

Taking its inspiration from traditional Mexican architecture, Hacienda Magica is laid out around a central courtyard and features details such as graceful arches, beamed ceilings and intricate tile. The main living and dining areas, just off the courtyard, are bright and comfortable, with vibrant walls and artwork.

There are eight bedrooms in the villa’s main house: five with king beds and three with two twin beds each. The hacienda also has three wings, each of which has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two twin beds. All fourteen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Provided kayaks and paddleboards make it easy to explore the waters of Fatima Bay just in front of the villa. If you’d like to see more of the area, it’s a 5-minute drive to the Puerto Aventuras Golf & Tennis Club and a 15-minute drive to both Xpu-Ha Beach and lively Playa del Carmen. Don’t miss a visit to the Tulum ruins, 30 minutes away by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
While staying at Cocoland, you’ll be treated to gorgeous water views and private relaxation areas with palm trees. Sitting on the hillside of Pointe Milou, this elegant home features plenty of sun and is one of our top St. Barts villas. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is known for its upscale appeal for being both private and prestigious.

On warm afternoons, go for a dip in the large pool, it’s surrounded by a deck with lounge chairs and tropical greenery and overlooks the sea. The backyard also features a private lawn with seating areas and water views. In the evenings, take advantage of the upper-level patio’s alfresco dining area and have a barbecue.

From the patio, step into the living room—it opens up to the terrace, perfectly blending the comforts of indoor and outdoor living. The decor is a mix of colonial and contemporary styles with plush sofas and accents done in soft, neutral colors. A second sitting room offers more sofas while the fully equipped kitchen has stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. You’ll also find extra gadgets like a dishwasher, ice maker, and an espresso machine for early morning lattes.

Up to four guests can stay in the villa’s two bedrooms on either side of living room, allowing for maximum privacy. Both feature king-sized beds, en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and televisions with DVD players.

The beaches at St. Barts offer a bounty of activities from snorkeling to deep-sea fishing to wind surfing and sailing or simply just taking in some sun on the sand—the nearest one is just five minutes away. You’re also just 7.4 km to Gustavia, the island’s capital where you’ll find top-notch restaurants, shops and spas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Nikki is a charming privately-owned villa in the exclusive gated residential community of Playacar Phase 1, in the heart of the famous Mayan Riviera. You cannot help but enjoy a relaxing, charming and cozy vacation to emerge rejuvenated like never before. A few steps away, you can revitalize your senses in the crystal-clear turquoise ocean and the finest white sands of the Mexican Caribbean. A short walk will take you to downtown Playa Del Carmen, one Mexico’s fastest growing resort towns, comprised of international restaurants, trendy bars, beach clubs and chic boutiques.

The magnificent three-level Mexican-style villa offers you easy access to the lovely private pool and garden. Jump into the glorious swimming pool and let the smooth water flow over your body in utter relaxation. Your villa includes satellite television, sound system, Wi-Fi, alfresco shower and rooftop terrace with lounging area. Relax in the sauna and relieve life’s day-to-day stresses. A barbeque sets the tone for lovely alfresco dining. Your reservation includes housekeeping and 24/7 security and concierge services.

Palapa-style living and state-of-the-art architecture leave Casa Nikki feeling sleek and tropical with a touch of avant-gardism. Feast in style in the dining area for eight next to the magnificent kitchen. White brick walls adorn the living and dining area completing the themes of minimalism and edgy design. The fully equipped kitchen includes a breakfast bar and is perfect for the culinary genius in the group.

With a total of five spectacular bedrooms, this villa can accommodate up to ten guests. Enjoy the master bedroom with king sized bed, en-suite bathroom with shower, air conditioning, garden view and a Sky TV. Bask in a tropical oasis with nothing but the cool ocean breeze tickling the tips of your hair.

Playa del Carmen is distinct among Yucatan beach towns both culturally and commercially. While its beaches are similar to other destinations, its nightlife and hotel culture is hipper in the European and American styles, blending the traditional Mexican locale with a more permissive and opulent array of tourist options. Go diving, snorkeling or take yourself back in history by visiting the Mayan Ruins. Whatever your style, Playa Del Carmen has something for everyone. Unwind in paradise at Casa Nikki!

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy the picture-perfect west coast of Barbados from a beautiful new villa at Mirador. Set right on the beach, this newly built luxury property couldn’t be better situated to offer gorgeous views of the turquoise water and easy access to the sugar-soft sand. A full staff and four bedrooms ensure a dream of a tropical holiday for you and up to eight friends or family members.

Your stay at this Fitts Village vacation rental includes the services of a cook at two meals per day, housekeeper, gardener and pool tender. Watch the sun move across the sea from private al-fresco living areas with plunge pools, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and dining for eight. After sunset, head indoors to unwind with the help of the satellite TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Fold-away glass doors connect the outdoor living areas with the open-concept great room, which encompasses living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The space is chic yet inviting, with fresh tones of white, blue and green that echo the lush surroundings.

Each of the four bedrooms at Mirador is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, ceiling fan and air conditioning. Three of the four bedrooms open directly to the terrace and have sea views. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are refined and contemporary, with plenty of crisp white set off by soft neutrals.

While the villa sits right on its own stretch of beach, it’s just a short drive from some of the island’s most famous—and most romantic—spots, from Paynes Bay Beach and Paradise Beach to celeb-favorite Sandy Lane Beach. If you’d like to to some sightseeing, set a course for the nearby Mount Gay Rum Distillery, book a tee time at Royal Westmoreland Golf Course or sample local fare at relaxed eateries around Holetown and Bridgetown.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ipanema is an exquisite villa within the Las Palmas area in Punta Mita. Steps from the beach, the villa enjoys ocean vistas across the Island Green and third tee box of the famous Pacifico Golf Course. Six bedroom suites accommodate fourteen guests, providing ideal accommodations for large groups of friends and family reunions.

The villa's design enhances your experience of the exquisite natural surroundings, with ample terrace space, breezy interiors, and diverse amenities for sport and play. Savor the Pacific sun while floating in your private pool or relaxing on stylish loungers. Take the villa's bicycles and surfboards to the beach, and return in the afternoon to alfresco meals from the outdoor kitchen (which includes a grill, wet bar, prep area, and fridge). Sip cocktails in the lounge at sunset, and gather in the hot tub at night for a starlit soak.

Folding glass doors invite the ocean breeze into the villa's interiors, creating an enchanting flow of air between the lounge, kitchen, and dining room. The kitchen is fully equipped for the modern chef, while the interior dining room offers a lovely setting for classic Mexican feasts, with a circular wooden table, high ceilings, and an enchanting luminosity from its ample windows and wrought-iron chandelier.

The villa's six bedrooms include three suites with outdoor living areas, as well as three rooms with kid-friendly bedding. All of the bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The deluxe, upper-level master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and covered terrace with sumptuous furnishings, while its ensuite bathroom includes an indoor shower, alfresco shower, and tub. Both primary guest suites open directly to the pool terrace, and one enjoys a hammock in its private niche.

Beyond your private haven, you're about a hundred paces from Punta Mita's private beach. Beyond the Las Palmas area, explore the famed surf village of Sayulita and enjoy an enchanting boat ride to the Marieta Islands.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sea splashes at the sand outside and marble tile splashes across the floors of this gated Mediterranean estate on Grand Cayman. The half-submerged chaises longues, the stools at the swim-up bar, and the outdoor TV angled toward the pool are perfectly positioned for comfort. Sail away from the dock of the Rum Point Club or stay to sip a mudslide at the bar that invented the cocktail.

Your holiday begins with a welcome basket—plus perks like booster seats for the youngest family members—and continues around a pool with a swim-up bar, a wading pool, plenty of loungers, a gas barbecue, and al-fresco dining for twelve. Take the provided tandem kayaks out for a paddle around the bay, and relax by the smart TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi when you need a little shade.

The villa makes a grand entrance with a sweeping double staircase leading to an island-side terrace, and the drama continues inside its 10,000 square feet of recently renovated living space. At the center is a double-height living room with an ocean-inspired blue-and-white color scheme, separated from the dining room and fully equipped kitchen by a bank of columns.

This vacation rental has six bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms. There are also two bedrooms that share a bathroom with en-suite access from both: one with two queen beds, and one with two double bunk beds. All eight bedrooms have air conditioning and smart TVs, so you have the luxury of following the game without getting out of bed.

Put your toes in the sand and relive your honeymoon with a stroll on the aptly named Barefoot Beach, right in front of the villa, or make the 2-minute drive to hammocks strung over white sands at Rum Point. Spend the day snorkeling the shallow bay, then reward yourself with a mudslide from Wreck Bar, which first blended the frozen concoction in the 1970s.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This charming villa blends contemporary attitude with traditional French Caribbean style. Set in a tropical courtyard with circular drive, the grand raised entrance begins the crescendo for the view. Set right at the ocean’s edge, the stunning scene flows over the wide green lawn right out to the turquoise sea and beyond to Anguilla and the poetic mountains of St Martin. Step through the gate right out to the sand.

Every room enjoys incredible views. The main living area’s glass doors disappear, giving you full access to the sea breezes and nature’s beauty. A spacious open plan includes multiple areas for lounging and dining. The villa’s décor tastefully mixes Indonesian teak with contemporary pieces in soft white. The sleek kitchen is a wonderful place to prepare a meal while taking advantage of the view and your guests.

Ample outdoor living includes sea facing covered verandas that connect all the rooms with the main house providing multiple opportunities for dining and relaxing. Oversize travertine tiles flow throughout blending the Epi wood pool deck for a seamless transition from interior to exterior. The large classic pool, the centerpiece of the deck, creates a visual connection with the sea. A grand gazebo sits at the ocean’s edge where you can relax in comfortable seating and enjoy the music of the surf from sunrise to sunset. If you prefer private garden views, a large well-furnished deck sits off the main living area. Large and small colorful tropical gardens are placed throughout the villa.

Four of the five bedrooms have private seating areas and sea views. The fifth bedroom is located at garden level with a private patio. The décor is a mix of soothing whites and warm beiges. The en suite bathrooms have a stylish spa feel complete with river stone trimmed showers, teak benches and marble tiles. Several bathrooms have ocean views.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. you are ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping.  Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.  

_ Please Note: Baie Rouge Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. For the best swimming renters are recommended to walk down the beach near the public entrance where the waters are more protected. _

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Connect with friends, family and nature at the beautiful Villa Amaranto. This one-of-a-kind Tulum vacation rental takes inspiration from ancient techniques to create an ambience of modern luxury. And though it’s tucked away in the exclusive La Privada neighborhood, it’s close to dining and shopping downtown Tulum, and the beach.

Make the most of the sunshine in private outdoor living areas with two plunge pools, lounging and dining furniture, a gas barbecue and a wet bar. There’s even a rooftop terrace where you can watch the stars come out. Or you might like to head inside to enjoy the satellite TV, integrated sound system, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.

The villa was designed by the award-winning local firm Studio Arquitectos of Tulum and named for amaranth, a pale-hued grain that was a staple for the Aztecs. The inspiration comes to life in the villa’s sophisticated neutral color scheme and the pieced-together quality of its walls, which were constructed using a Mayan technique known as chukum. With a slide-away glass wall connecting the terrace to an open-concept great room with a sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, you’ll be spending most of your time in this inviting indoor-outdoor space.

Villa Amaranto has one master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. All three bedrooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans and open to a balcony.

A holiday in this part of Mexico can be as relaxed or as active as you like—and a stay at Villa Amaranto makes it easy. Guests are welcome at the community’s shared pool and racquetball court. Plus, the villa is just a 5-minute drive from downtown Tulum, and a short drive or bike ride from its beach, where you can browse for unique finds in the boutiques or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a restaurant.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction site. For more information, contact a Villa Specialist.

listing.listing_description:
An infinity pool laps at the terrace at this villa in a gated community at Las Terrenas. Clean-lined architecture clad in creamy stone is the backdrop to 360-degree panoramas of lush hills and the Atlantic Ocean. It’s a 10-minute walk through the quiet residential neighborhood to a sandy beach, or a 10-minute drive down a private access road to bars and restaurants by the water.

 

Caribbean sunshine floods outdoor living spaces with an infinity pool and loungers, but there are also shaded al-fresco sitting areas, as well as a barbecue and a dining table for 8. Find your new favorite rum by mixing cocktails at the indoor wet bar, keep up with your favorite shows on the Apple TV, and share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.

 

Floor-to-ceiling glass and slide-away walls connect the indoor great room to the outdoor living spaces—and show off the ocean views, too. White sofas and a blond-wood dining table lend the ambience of a luxury spa to the living and dining areas, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped. For your comfort, this vacation rental also has ceiling fans and air conditioning.

 

Villa Elroca has 4 bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with a queen bed; all 5 bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Like the great room, the bedrooms have a monochromatic look that creates a restful feel, with plenty of pale stone and blond wood.

 

The Dominican Republic is known for white-sand beaches right out of a honeymoon ad, and a stay at Villa Elroca puts you just a 10-minute walk from the nearest one. You can also choose to walk to the community’s 3 tennis courts or drive to downtown Las Terrenas to check out locally owned restaurants or socialize at the waterfront bars.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located along Provo’s stunning Long Bay Beach, Pearl East is one of three homes within the Pearls of Long Bay Estate property. The perks at this luxury vacation rental have been set to overdrive for fun in the sun and pleasant repose. Get the rest and relaxation you deserve, next holiday, at this exclusive oceanfront property in the Turks and Caicos!

The grounds at Pearl East include two swimming pools and a children’s wading pool. Or perhaps it’s time for a soothing soak in the therapeutic bubbles of the hot tub? Decked out for the consummate entertainer, you will also find the following: alfresco dining for eight, a pool bar, a Japanese teppanyaki cooking station, a barbeque, sun loungers, umbrellas, a beachside sound system and a children’s play set. The interiors of this elegant residence are equally impressive with a stunning home theater room with popcorn machine, cable TV, an indoor/outdoor sound system and other divertissements including Netflix, Apple TV and a DVD/Blu-ray player. Your reservation includes housekeeping, and a private chef.

Pearl East offers guests uninterrupted views of the turquoise waters spanning the Caicos Banks while marrying contemporary design with Caribbean barefoot luxury. This stunning home seamlessly harmonizes the idea of indoor/outdoor living with beautiful landscaping, decks and lagoons throughout for 12,000 square feet of sophisticated living. High vaulted ceilings and plenty of overhead fans keep the feelings airy and breezy.

Eight exquisite bedroom suites accommodate up to twenty guests at this non-smoking villa. Access to the outdoors is a breeze! All of the suites offer dual vanities, televisions, Netflix and Apple TV. Sleep soundly with nothing but the ocean waves as your soundtrack!

Pearl East shares first class amenities reminiscent of a five star resort with the other homes at this estate. Continue your workout regime in the state of the art 1,000 square foot gymnasium or get together for some tennis on the championship court. Relax in the Turkish steam bath, sauna or alfresco massage pavilion. The Provo Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Pearl East is ideal for a group of family or friends and can even serve as the locale for a dream wedding or a decadent honeymoon!

listing.listing_description:
Located just steps from Mexico’s beloved oceanfront promenade, The Malecon, Punta Del Cielo is right in the heart of this astonishing coastal community. With gorgeous beach and oceanfront on one side and the bustling bars, restaurants, and nightlife of Puerto Vallarta’s downtown core on the other, The Malecon is the place to be. Nearby by, you’ll find several world-class beaches, golf courses, and exciting tourist excursions. And, with six luxurious bedrooms, this villa is perfect for a large family vacation, a social getaway with a group of friends, or a sun-kissed corporate retreat.

There won’t be any fighting over “the good bedroom” at Punta Del Cielo. Each one is lavishly decorated with a king-sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and an amazing ocean view. In fact, nearly every inch of this hillside home has a spectacular ocean view. With plenty of openings to the multi-leveled terrace, most interior spaces flow seamlessly outside to more functional, furnished areas. The vibe of this vacation villa is all about elegant relaxation and the enjoyment of Mexico’s natural features. Lush greenery, eclectic artwork, high-end electronics, and designer furniture decorate each unique area, creating a relaxing, yet functional home for your next Luxury Retreats getaway.

Inside, Punta Del Cielo comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal dining for twelve, Wi-Fi, and satellite television. On the terrace, there’s a refreshing infinity pool, Alfresco dining, and plenty of sun loungers, just sit back and enjoy the ocean view.

The quickest and easiest way to see what’s going on in Puerto Vallarta is to walk The Malecon; you’ll probably spend a lot of time there. After you’ve done that, venture on to some of Mexico’s most famous beaches, like Camarones, Olas Atlas, and Los Muertos, all within two-kilometers. If you’ve got a golf aficionado in the group, Vista Vallarta and El Tigre Golf Clubs are close by, both feature carefully designed holes, as challenging as they are scenic.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Construction Note:  Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Sweeping ocean views and the gorgeous beaches of Costa Rica’s Papagayo Peninsula await at Villa Serena. With four luxurious bedrooms, three view ocean views, this villa is ideal for a family beach getaway or a golf trip with friends. You’ll appreciate the private atmosphere, inside and out, thanks to the lush tropical greenery of this gated, hillside estate. Nearby, you’ll find golf, tennis, shops, restaurants, natural wonders, and of course, plenty of pristine beachfront.

Dark wood trim, creamy-white walls, and elegant stone accents give Villa Serena a luxurious, yet soothing atmosphere, perfect for any occasion. Throughout the open concept living room, you’ll find numerous glass doors to the terrace that slide open to invite the natural sunlight and fresh sea breeze to fill the villa’s interior. With such a spacious common area and plush designer furnishings, you and your guests will love gathering and relaxing, in the ocean-view living room, especially after a day on the beach.

Villa Serena’s fully equipped kitchen comes with state of the art appliances, and a casual breakfast bar. There is a formal dining area inside, as well as an alfresco set on the terrace with a beautiful view of the Gulf of Papagayo. The hot tub, swimming pool, and outdoor lounge are also great places to enjoy the view. Back inside, you’ll appreciate Wi-Fi, cable and Apple TV, a Sonos sound system, and air conditioning, as well as daily housekeeping for the duration of your stay.

First stop, Prieta Beach Club, of which you’ll have a view. Spending your afternoons soaking up the sun and surf is easy on the Papagayo Peninsula, with Poro Poro, Playa Virador, and Playa Nacascolo, all within a few minutes of home. For the golfers in your group, the legendary Arnold Palmer has designed a namesake course, just one kilometer away at the Four Seasons. If you’re in the mood for shopping, dining, or nightlife, head to Playa Hermosa. And, if you’d like to visit one of Costa Rica’s most prized natural wonders, Rincon de la Vieja Volcano National Park is perfect for an afternoon excursion.
